metadata.title: Can you imagine your first college project being a game? - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: At Inteli, electronic games are more than just fun: they are the gateway to real projects, technical and socio-emotional skills in technology education.

content_blocks.text: Inteli>Graduation>Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

content_blocks.text:
Inteli>Graduation>Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

- Julia Stateri
- 23 Sep 2025
- Julia Stateri
- 23 Sep 2025
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

content_blocks.text: Ifgameshave the power to transport us to another reality,electronic gamesdo so even more intensely, with clear rules that can hardly be circumvented. It's in the workings of thealgorithmthatgame designersbuild idealized universes - sometimes magical and enchanting, sometimes dark and challenging.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

content_blocks.text: It's not hard to imagine young people full of dreams and the desire to transform the future marveling at the chance to put these ideals into practice within a game, throughcodeandpixels.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, this is exactly how the journey of the first year in the courses ofSoftware Engineering,Computer Engineering,Computer Science,Information SystemseAdm Tech.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?

content_blocks.text: Beyond fun
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Beyond fun

content_blocks.text: What may seem like a joke to many outsiders is actually a collective effort that brings together many different pieces to create a uniqueexperience.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Beyond fun

content_blocks.text: Through a combination ofAgile MethodologiesandProject Based Learning, students are challenged to learn programming, logic, project management, game design, narrative creation, asset development and many other technical skills in just ten weeks.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Beyond fun

content_blocks.text: At the end, they present a viable solution to a real problem faced by a market partner.IBM, Oracle, UFAL, FM-USP, Vivoand several other institutions have already put their trust in our students' energy and willingness to learn - and none of them have regretted their choice.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Beyond fun

content_blocks.text: Far beyond technique
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Far beyond technique

content_blocks.text: Putting projects into practice goes beyond the technical side: it also involves developingsocio-emotional skills. These are skills and behaviors worked on intentionally by the academic team and theLeadership Development Center.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Far beyond technique

content_blocks.text: Training bytechniquealone is a thing of the past. In a world marked byautomationand rapid access to information, the real risk is thatcritical thinkingdoesn't keep up with the speed of technology.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Far beyond technique

content_blocks.text: For this reason, socio-emotional competencies are fundamental not only to ensuring our students' employability, but also to preparing citizens capable of building an up-to-date - and, above all, humane - society. At Inteli, they develop self-knowledge, communication and other essential skills, always in line with the values of Global Citizenship.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Far beyond technique

content_blocks.text: Real impact of the games created by the students
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Real impact of the games created by the students

content_blocks.text: The result can be seen in our productions(visit our public directories for more information):
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Real impact of the games created by the students

content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Real impact of the games created by the students

content_blocks.text: What better way to introduce our students to this challenge and responsibility than through a complete medium that is as close to our daily lives and human socialization as games?
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Real impact of the games created by the students

content_blocks.text: Games bring us closer together and make us forget our differences. At Inteli, they are our gateway and welcome to a world that is opening up to young people from all over the country (and the world, since we are going international!). The first contact with the understanding that their ideals can materialize into reality.
content_blocks.section: Can you imagine your first college project being a game?
content_blocks.subsection: Real impact of the games created by the students

content_blocks.text:
